# Rodentia
Rodentia are a race of humanoid beings resembling rodents. Resourceful, evasive, sneaky, but fragile.
## Diet
Rodentia share evolutionary roots with rodents, and so they cannot metabolize Theobromine or Allicin. Be careful when eating chocolate, onions, or garlic, and avoid coffee and tea!
## Claws
Rodentia have dull claws, which do a mixture of [color=#ec3a3a]Blunt[/color] and [color=#ec3a3a]Slashing[/color] damage.
## Rummaging
Rodentia can rummage in disposal units, potentially finding food or other useful !
## Cheek Storage
Rodentia can store small items in their cheeks. Having items in their mouth makes their speech unintelligible, and they will drop all items in their mouth if attacked, stunned, or shoved.
## Drawbacks
Rodentia take 30% more [color=#ec3a3a]Blunt[/color] damage, and 15% more [color=#ec3a3a]Slashing[/color] and [color=#ec3a3a]Piercing[/color] damage. Rodentia always triggers mousetraps, regardless of whether or not they are wearing shoes. Rodentia get hungry 33% faster.
